akn:content.akn:p:
§ 7114. Fees The Secretary may prescribe by regulation reasonable fees for the inspection of and the issuance of a certificate, license, or permit related to small passenger vessels and sailing school vessels. (Pub. L. 98–89, Aug. 26, 1983, 97 Stat. 541.)
Historical and Revision Notes
Revised sectionSource section (U.S. Code)
711446:390a(b)
Section 7114 allows the Secretary to prescribe reasonable fees for the issuance of a certificate of inspection, license, or registry, or permits related to small passenger vessels and sailing school vessels.
